SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

transformation
Class Transformation

java.lang.Object
  transformation.Transformation

public class Transformation
extends java.lang.Object

A class which facilitates transformations between a domain interval and a range interval via an implementation of a mapping.

Author:
Curran Kelleher

Field Summary
 Interval domain
          The domain, or input range of this transformation
 TransformationMapping function
          The mapping function which is used by this transformation
 Interval range
          The range, or output range of this transformation
 
Constructor Summary
Transformation()
          Construct a transformation with domain and range intervals both from 0 to 1, and a linear transformation function.
Transformation(Interval range)
          Construct a transformation which maps from the a default domain (input interval) of 0 to 1, to the specified range (output interval), using a linear transformation function.
Transformation(Interval domain, Interval range)
          Construct a transformation which maps from the specified domain (input interval) to the specified range (output interval), using a linear transformation function.
Transformation(Interval domain, Interval range, TransformationMapping function)
          Construct a transformation which maps from the specified domain (input interval) to the specified range (output interval), using the specified transformation function.
 
Method Summary
 double inverseTransform(double rangeValue)
          Maps the specified value from the range to the domain; performs the inverse function of transform()
 double transform(double domainValue)
          Maps the specified value from the domain to the range
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
